website_summaries.verdict: The ultimate crossover of precise pinball action and the best of the Star Wars series, Star Wars pinball is far cheaper than downloading each individual pinball table.
pros: 19 Star Wars-themed pinball boards, including Boba Fett, Droids, Solo, and Darth Vader
cons: Physical edition is only available on Nintendo Switch

customer_reviews.title: More bang for your buck!
customer_reviews.text: I was excited when Star Wars Pinball was announced for the Nintendo Switch. I owned the Wii U version which did not receive the same features or new tables when the were released, and this all but makes up for it. Containing all tables released to date and various play modes that were not in the Wii U version. Overall the price is cheaper than it would have been to buy each table collection when the were released. The Only Down sides I see from this game are some lackluster voice acting, No Prequel Trilogy Tables, and a lack of music options (no music from the sequel trilogy or the anthology films).
customer_reviews.author: Nyan Cat

customer_reviews.title: A Must for any Star Wars Fan
customer_reviews.text: I intitially bought this because 1. It's Star Wars and 2. It was $20. After having to wait a month to get it well worth the wait and better than I expected it to be. There ton's of tables focusing on the movies, characters, and TV shows and they are vastly different so you don't get bored playing. If you like Star Wars and own a switch buy this now but beware it is addicting!
customer_reviews.author: TD

customer_reviews.title: Great for Pinball or Star Wars fans!
customer_reviews.text: Great game! Huge variety of game modes, leaderboards, and tables to play. I'm more of a star wars fan than a pinball fan, and they really did an amazing job with the visuals and physics to keep me entertained. Highly recommend this for a fun casual game to add to your collection for all ages!
customer_reviews.author: Tommy M.

customer_reviews.title: Must-buy for fans of pinball and Star Wars
customer_reviews.text: The are tons of tables, modes and bonuses in this tiny cart. The music is great, it's all of the original soundtracks. The game play modes make it a challenge and the game play itself is tons of fun. The ONLY downside that I have found is that the voices in the game aren't the original actors. They're close, but not the real thing. It's something you notice once, then quickly forget about. This game is a must-buy if you like pinball and star wars.
customer_reviews.author: Welwood

customer_reviews.title: Zen Pinball is the greatest, most wonderful pinball game I've ever met in my life.
customer_reviews.text: All 19 tables from the Zen Pinball collection? Yes, please. I already have these on the PC and the PS4, but I couldn't resist this for the Switch at about $1 per table. Oh, yeah, I've got them on Android, too. I might have a problem. But, you can never have too much pinball. Right? Get it. It's a no-brainer.
customer_reviews.author: brian c mulligan

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: Great value. Plays like real pinball. Tons on content league play, career mode etc. fun tables. Great purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Joshua LaFrance

customer_reviews.title: Great game!
customer_reviews.text: Great game! If you're a Star Wars fan you'll love the game. Has tons of different tables to choose from.
customer_reviews.author: Michael S. Forsberg

customer_reviews.title: It's pinball and done correctly.
customer_reviews.text: Customizable. Fun to play. Rewards. You name it. It's actually good! You can even play vertically if you choose so. This is worth every penny.
customer_reviews.author: Joanne Knapp

customer_reviews.title: S’Good
customer_reviews.text: I would have liked a Phantom Menace table, but otherwise a really wonderful pinball experience!
customer_reviews.author: KPM

customer_reviews.title: Saber flippers
customer_reviews.text: Zen has bundled the SW tables from PBFX3 and improved them in the process. Since they have never been on the Switch it is a perfect fit. We still get matchups, tournaments, and leaderboards as well as a soundtrack cantina with unlockable songs and a career mode. I would love to see the entire Marvel series of tables get a standalone release like this. Nice one Zen keep them coming. Oh yeah portrait mode works docked just like PBFX3.
customer_reviews.author: Phantasmagoria

product_meta.title: Star Wars Pinball - Nintendo Switch
product_meta.description: Star Wars Pinball offers 19 exciting digital tables covering every corner of the galaxy, from movie and television adaptations to iconic characters, locations, and Star Wars themes. Exclusive Nintendo Switch features like HD Rumble and vertical play bring the pinball experience to life, as you take on legendary adversaries, TIE fighters, Death Stars…and the leaderboards! Play in a traditional pinball manner, or engage in short Career Mode challenges. Then add in some Force powers to see your scores climb faster than lightspeed. And will you choose the ways of the Jedi or the Sith? What is your destiny?
feature_bullets: Pinball fans of all ages are taken to a galaxy far, far away with Star Wars Pinball
Featuring a collection of 19 different pinball tables
Each pinball table features a different iconic moment from the Star Wars universe

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.6 out of 5 stars142 ratings4.6 out of 5 stars
specifications.Pricing: The strikethrough price is the List Price. Savings represents a discount off the List Price.
